digital.title: AZM Digital
digital.description: AZM Digital is a wholly-owned company of the AZM Group, specializing in the design, construction, and operation of scalable digital platforms to support national digital transformation in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. The company develops technology solutions compliant with regulations in financial technology, digital identity, trust services, payments, and compliance, supporting Saudi Vision 2030 targets.

fintech.title: AZM FinTech
fintech.description: AZM FinTech is the specialized financial technology arm of the AZM Group, focusing on the design, development, and operation of regulated digital financing platforms. The company offers advanced technology solutions, particularly in crowdfunding and alternative financing, through secure and regulatory-compliant digital platforms that connect investors, funding entities, and project owners.

software.title: AZM Software Development
software.description: AZM Software Development is the engineering and product implementation arm of the AZM Group, established in 2023 to design, build, and operate scalable digital platforms and custom technology solutions. The company specializes in comprehensive software development, with a focus on operating and maintaining vital platforms that require high reliability, security, and operational sustainability at the government and business sector levels.
software.productsTitle: Examples of AZM Software Development products

ax.title: AZM AX
ax.description: AZM AX is the specialized digital experience and design arm of the AZM Group, established in 2021 to provide user-centric digital experiences compliant with policies for government platforms and the business sector. The company specializes in transforming complex services into easy and clear digital journeys through research-based design and frontend development, ensuring ease of use, compliance, and national standards.

entropy.title: Entropy
entropy.description: Entropy is the specialized artificial intelligence and data analytics arm of the AZM Group, focusing on designing and operating advanced digital platforms for government entities and the business sector. The company offers integrated solutions including machine learning, data engineering, advanced analytics, and intelligent automation, enabling data-driven decision-making and operational efficiency improvement. Entropy contributes to enhancing digital platforms with predictive and scalable intelligence capabilities.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: We are moving forward with our strategic initiatives, where we have restructured our business operations to better reflect our company's activities. The business operations have been redesigned as follows:

technical.title: Technical Services
technical.description: Services that include support, operation, maintenance, ICT, digitization, and procurement of equipment and supplies.

consulting.title: Technical Consulting
consulting.description: Providing technical consulting services and application consulting services.

development.title: Development Services
development.description: What is being developed and invented of products, solutions, and services to serve government sector, financial sector, digital correspondence, and procedures management.

platforms.title: Platforms Development
platforms.description: Designing, building, developing, and operating the company's platforms, including PPP projects with the public sector.

contributions.title: Our Community Contributions
contributions.description: AZM Saudi is committed to its social responsibilities through a clear vision and is working to establish sustainable partnerships with the various communities it works with, ensuring it provides social responsibility programs that generate tangible economic and social impact.

professional.title: Professional Development
professional.description: This portfolio focuses on professional development through providing training options and establishing continuous education for its employees, along with creating an encouraging work environment that helps them grow professionally and personally.

community.title: Community Partnership
community.description: Through this portfolio, AZM Saudi reaches out to various communities to build sustainable partnerships with community institutions and civil society organizations, providing them with various forms of support, both digital and material.

initiatives.title: Strategic Initiatives
initiatives.description: AZM Saudi launches general initiatives under this portfolio that serve all segments of society with different community service programs that are aimed at raising awareness, education, health, environment, culture, and others.

omar2.name: Omar AlSunaidi
omar2.bio: Expert in governance and the financial sector. Previously served as Director of Corporate Governance at the Capital Market Authority. Currently serves as Director of Governance at a prominent Saudi company listed in the banking sector.
